componentInstanceProperties.name: message
componentInstanceProperties.value: Don't forget to validate your order !

visibilityRule.booleanFilter: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 ) AND (6 OR ( 7 AND 8 ))
(1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 ) AND (7 OR (8 AND 9)) OR (NOT 5 AND 1 AND 10 )
(1 OR 2 OR 3) AND ( (4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8) OR 9 )
(1 OR 2) AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7
(1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7) AND (8 OR (9 AND 10))
(1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7) AND (8 OR (9 AND 10))
1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND ( 5 OR ( 6 AND 7 ))
(1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5) AND (6 OR (7 AND 8))
